name: Careernet
description: We are Careernet..We are India’s leading talent solutions provider. We are the trusted partner for you to shape your teams with holistic solutions at scale, and candidates to realise their dream careers. If you’re a global employer starting in India, or an indigenous startup, or a large enterprise scaling up operations, your talent needs are at the heart of what we do. We always see to it that you find what you’re searching for. From finding the most passionate individual to looking for an entire team, we are adept at helping your organisation find the best talent. We help organisations discover markets, start business and scale up. And we have been doing it all since 1999.
features: Meeting the talent needs of all industries
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: We make dream careers happen
ShortDescription: Careernet is India’s leading talent solutions provider. Careernet is trusted partner to shape your teams with holistic solutions at scale.
enhanced_description: Careernet, established in 1999 and headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka, is India's leading talent solutions provider. They offer holistic and scalable solutions encompassing both staffing services and software for recruiting and talent management. Careernet serves a diverse range of clients, including global employers expanding into India, indigenous startups, and large enterprises scaling up operations. The company focuses on fostering innovation in talent acquisition across all industries, aiming to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity while improving overall employee happiness and engagement through high-quality technology-enabled experiences. Their services extend to helping organizations find individual talent or entire teams, as well as supporting strategic initiatives like market discovery, business initiation, and organizational scaling.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and recruitment (individual and team sourcing)
Strategic workforce planning for market entry and business scaling
Improving hiring manager effectiveness and productivity
Leveraging technology for recruitment and talent management processes
competitive_advantages: India's leading talent solutions provider status
Provision of holistic solutions at scale
Expertise in helping organizations discover markets, start businesses, and scale up
Ability to meet talent needs across all industries
roi_benefits: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Support for business growth and market entry
scalability_features: Designed to provide holistic solutions at scale
Supports large enterprises scaling up operations
